preference.name: WsoInsertNoSelectionsPref
preference.preference_description: When no object selected, which folder/object should have a reference to it. Valid values are 1/2/3. 1 - Newstuff folder. 2 - RootFolder. 3 - None (place in database, but with no references to it).
